message.body: Hey mel-cakes-bear-unicorn, thinking of you at what may be a celebratory, anticipatory, and stressful time. I believe in what you do and who you are and i can't wait to see your hard work! And after its finished - fucking hang out. Much love to you strong fierce Fiery woman. Much of it. Xoxoxoxo

Thank you So so so much for this message. This weekends rehearsals put us in a super good place which feels great so less stress, more fun. I really appreciate your words- I've been and am battling myself quite a lot, the encouragement is so appreciated Martha. You know I feel the same for you. Yes to hanging out- would LOVE it. Maybe after whatever night you come this week. Thanks again for the thoughts. Hope all is lovely and peaceful with you. Xoxoxo m

:) :) :) good morning, love. I'm coming on Thursday when a friend is visiting, so it'd be great if we hung out with her! Would you mind doing me a favor? My periods on its way and my magic device is on my dresser - does it gross you out to bring it to school bc if so don't worry about it
